etymology.description: 乌鲁木齐 (phonetic of Ürümchi) + 市 (city) = “Urumqi City.”
etymology.interpretation: Phonetic rendering of the Uyghur/Oirat name Ürümchi, with characters chosen for sound rather than meaning. The suffix 市 marks it as a city-level administrative unit and the capital of Xinjiang.
etymology.simplification: 烏→乌, 魯→鲁, 齊→齐 were simplified per PRC standards; transliteration preserved; 木、市 unchanged.

examples.chinese: 乌鲁木齐市是新疆的首府(烏魯木齊市是新疆的首府)。
examples.pinyin: Wūlǔmùqí Shì shì Xīnjiāng de shǒufǔ.
examples.english: Urumqi is the capital of Xinjiang.

examples.chinese: 我们从北京飞往乌鲁木齐市(我們從北京飛往烏魯木齊市)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒmen cóng Běijīng fēiwǎng Wūlǔmùqí Shì.
examples.english: We flew from Beijing to Urumqi.

examples.chinese: 乌鲁木齐市的名字源自当地的民族语言(烏魯木齊市的名字源自當地的民族語言)。
examples.pinyin: Wūlǔmùqí Shì de míngzi yuán zì dāngdì de mínzú yǔyán.
examples.english: The name Urumqi comes from local ethnic languages.
